body_html:
I have cudnn 5.1 and cuda-8.0. cudnn is copied in cuda's directory. I've also appended it's path to the system PATHs as:

C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v8.0\bin

Also msvcp140.dll is included both in systemWow64 and system32 and I use Python 3.5.2.

What is wrong? Have you faced the same problem?
body_text:

body:
I have cudnn 5.1 and cuda-8.0. cudnn is copied in cuda's directory. I've also appended it's path to the system PATHs as:

C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v8.0\bin

Also msvcp140.dll is included both in systemWow64 and system32 and I use Python 3.5.2.

What is wrong? Have you faced the same problem?
